channel.title: Research Resources on Musings of an Itinerant Software Designer
channel.description: Recent content in Research Resources on Musings of an Itinerant Software Designer

item.title: Creating the wiki on this site
item.description: When I started this site I always planned that it would help me organise information, not just be a blog. These blog notes are just my stream of conciousness, with a primary purpose being to think about how and why the real content is managed. One of the major things I wanted to organise is a large collection of research papers that I’ve been accumulating ever since I first got an Internet connection (1992).
